question: How many inhabitants approximately live in the urban area of Jihlava, Czech Republic as of the most recent records?
asked_question_translated: Hvor mange innbyggere bor det omtrent i byområdet Jihlava i Tsjekkia ifølge de siste registreringene?
answer: Byområdet Jihlava i Tsjekkia har omtrent 50 000 innbyggere ifølge de siste registreringene.
answer_translated_eng: The urban area of Jihlava in the Czech Republic has approximately 50,000 inhabitants according to the latest records.
